Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the deck of cards.
See Also:

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck(String cardsFile)
    This constructor generates the deck of cards from a JSON file and shuffles it.

    This constructor generates the deck of cards from a JSON file and shuffles it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck(String cardsFile) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, IllegalArgumentException
      This constructor generates the deck of cards from a JSON file and shuffles it.
      Parameters:
      cardsFile - the path of the JSON file containing the cards.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the JSON file is not valid.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card prototype is invalid.

    • Deck

      public Deck(String cardsFile, boolean toFile) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This constructor generates the deck of cards from a JSON file and shuffles it.
      Parameters:
      cardsFile - the path of the JSON file containing the cards.
      toFile - a boolean that is true if the deck is generated to be saved in a file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the JSON file is not valid.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card prototype is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • getKingdomFirstCard

      public Kingdom getKingdomFirstCard() throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method returns the kingdom of the first card of the deck.
      Returns:
      the Kingdom of the first card of the deck.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the deck is empty.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(int position) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns the card at the specified position in the deck.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card in the deck.
      Returns:
      The card at the specified position.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the position is out of range (position invalid input: '<' 0 || position >= size()).

    • draw

      public Card draw() throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method returns the first Card of the deck and then removes it from the deck.
      Returns:
      the first Card of the deck.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the deck is empty.
